Massachusetts State Senator @EricLesser (who just gave a great floor speech) notes many groups like @CommonCauseMA @ACLU_Mass, @LWVMA, @massteacher, @AFSCME93, & @MassSierraClub opposes a call for an Article V convention. #mapoli
